title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Planning and
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Planning and 

Development Regulations 2001 (S.I. No. 600 of 2001). 

Amendment of Schedule 5, Part 2
text_norm: 3 regulation principal regulation mean planning development regulation 2001 (s.i no 600 2001) amendment schedule 5 part 2

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 4. Schedule 5, Part 2 of the Principal Regulations is amended:
text_raw:
4. Schedule 5, Part 2 of the Principal Regulations is amended: 

(a) By the insertion of the following before paragraph (c) : 

"(a) Projects for the restructuring of rural land holdings, undertaken 
as part of a wider proposed development, and not as an agricultural 
activity that must comply with the European Communities 
(Environmental Impact Assessment) (Agriculture) Regulations 
2011, where the length of field boundary to be removed is above 4 
kilometres, or where re-contouring is above 5 hectares, or where the 
area of lands to be restructured by removal of field boundaries is 
above 50 hectares. ". 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 28th July, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [383] 3 

GIVEN under my Hand, 

24 July, 2023. 

KIERAN O’DONNELL, 

Minister of State at the Department of Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [383]
